content.text:
Technology today is evolving rapidly, it was already changing before the outbreak of COVID-19, but during and after the pandemic, technology allowed people to have more accessibility. We needed to be connected to survive. We were already in an era where mobility was necessary. Hence, flights to different parts of the world were popular. Still, now, we are looking at two things that the pandemic allowed us to live: The skyrocketing accessibility and mobility.
Now, we are looking at personal trainers who created award-winning fitness programs with their classes that are on demand. So, people work out at home instead of going to a studio. Some influencers dedicate their lives to trying on and promoting skin care products that are now very important. Architects that work on building high-tech houses. And, of course, workstations that can be used by many people who don't have an office at home.
We are living in exciting times... What will the future bring for us?
